name: Escaping Antarctica
description:
Escaping Antarctica is a 2D fan game inspired by Petra Gurin from Nijisanji EN. Solve a series of challenging block-pushing puzzles to help the lonely frost penguin Petra to escape the icy confines of her arctic home, fulfilling her dreams of experiencing human society for the first time.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • R - restart level
  • Space - push
  • Esc - menu
